description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The baron is having a day in the park , he decides it's lunch time and settles down on a bench to eat some chips and alas the gulls appear. You , a friendly bystander with a .44 magnum , decide to help out by shooting this avian menace and saving the baron's chips!
description.short: The baron is having a day in the park , he decides it's lunch time and settles down on a bench to eat some chips and alas the gulls appear. You , a friendly bystander with a .44 magnum , decide to help out by shooting this avian menace and saving the baron's chips!
